s1_0.text: If you could win a free trip right now, where would you go?
s1_0.o0: A remote cabin in the woods
s1_0.o1: A luxury penthouse in a busy city
s1_0.o2: A van-life road trip across the coast

s1_1.text: What is your absolute favorite way to spend a Friday night?
s1_1.o0: Dancing and socializing at a club
s1_1.o2: Working on a personal hobby or project

s1_2.text: Which superpower would be most useful for a first date?

s1_3.text: How do you usually handle a Sunday morning?

s1_4.text: If your life was a movie genre, which one would it be?

s1_5.text: What is your 'guilty pleasure' when it comes to food?
s1_5.o2: Eating a whole jar of Nutella/Peanut butter

s1_6.text: If you could have dinner with any historical figure, who would you pick?

s1_7.text: What is your stance on 'Social Media' in a relationship?

s1_8.text: Which animal best represents your social energy?

s1_9.text: How do you react to a spontaneous plan?
s1_9.o1: I need at least 24 hours notice
s1_9.o2: Depends on who else is coming

s1_10.text: What is your favorite season of the year?

s1_11.text: If you won $1 million today, what is the first thing you'd buy?
s1_11.o2: A ticket to travel the world

s1_12.text: What kind of music controls your mood?

s1_13.text: Are you a morning person or a night owl?
s1_13.o1: Night owl - my brain starts at 10 PM

s1_14.text: Which of these is a total 'deal-breaker' for you?

s1_15.text: If you could live in any fictional world, which would it be?
s1_15.o0: A world of Magic (Harry Potter style)
s1_15.o2: A peaceful Fantasy land (Lord of the Rings)

s1_16.text: What is your dream job if money didn't matter?

s1_17.text: How do you usually discover new music or movies?

s1_18.text: What is your favorite type of weather?

s1_19.text: If you were a color, which one would you be?

s1_20.text: What is your biggest 'pet peeve' in a conversation?
s1_20.o2: People talking too much about themselves

s1_22.text: What is your favorite 'Small Talk' topic?

s1_23.text: If you could learn any language instantly, what would it be?

s1_24.text: What is your ideal first date activity?
s1_24.o1: Something active like Bowling or Mini-golf
s1_24.o2: A quiet walk in a park or gallery

s1_25.text: Do you prefer big parties or small gatherings?

s1_26.text: What is the best way to cheer you up?

s1_27.text: If you could change one thing about your past, would you?
s1_27.o0: Yes, to avoid a specific mistake
s1_27.o1: No, it made me who I am
s1_27.o2: Only if I could keep my current knowledge

s1_28.text: What is your most used Emoji?

s1_29.text: What is your 'comfort movie' that you can watch forever?

s2_0.text: What is the most important foundation for a long-term relationship?

s2_1.text: How do you prefer to resolve a disagreement?
s2_1.o1: Take some time to cool off first

s2_2.text: What does 'loyalty' mean to you in one word?

s2_3.text: If you had to move to another country tomorrow, what would you miss most?

s2_4.text: What is your biggest fear regarding a serious relationship?

s2_5.text: How do you view 'Money' in a partnership?
s2_5.o2: Common pool for bills, separate for personal

s2_7.text: How much 'Alone Time' do you need when living with someone?
s2_7.o0: A lot - I need my own space
s2_7.o1: Very little - I love being together
s2_7.o2: Just a few hours a week

s2_8.text: What is your opinion on 'White Lies' to protect a partner's feelings?
s2_8.o2: Depends on how big the lie is

s2_9.text: What are you most proud of in your life so far?

s2_10.text: How do you handle a partner who has very different political views?

s2_11.text: What is the best piece of advice you‚Äôve ever received?
s2_11.o1: Treat others as you want to be treated

s2_12.text: How do you want to be remembered by people?

s2_13.text: What is your definition of a 'Soulmate'?
s2_13.o0: One perfect person exists for everyone
s2_13.o1: Someone you choose to build a life with
s2_13.o2: A spiritual connection from a past life

s2_14.text: How do you feel about your partner staying friends with their Ex?
s2_14.o2: Only if I meet them too

s2_15.text: If you could change one personality trait of yours, what would it be?

s2_16.text: What is your ultimate goal for the next 5 years?
s2_16.o1: Reaching the top of my career
s2_16.o2: Living a life of freedom and travel

s2_17.o2: I ignore it and move on

s2_18.text: What makes you feel the most 'vulnerable'?

s2_19.text: What is your view on 'Having Kids'?

s2_20.text: How do you show someone you care about them?

s2_21.text: What is the bravest thing you've ever done?
s2_21.o0: Moving to a new city alone

s2_22.text: Do you believe in 'Love at first sight'?

s2_23.text: What is your relationship with your parents like now?
s2_23.o0: Very close - they are my best friends

s2_24.text: How do you deal with jealousy?

s2_25.text: What is the most 'attractive' quality a person can have?

s2_26.text: If you could tell your younger self one thing, what would it be?

s2_28.text: What does 'Home' feel like to you?
s2_28.o2: A feeling of safety within myself

s2_29.text: What is the one thing you would never sacrifice for a relationship?
